reviews.customers_say: Customers find this Christmas sweater looks exactly as pictured and is well-made, comfortable, and surprisingly soft, making it perfect for holiday parties and fun at Christmas gatherings. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it runs true to size, others find it runs large. Opinions on value are divided, with some saying it's worth the money while others feel it's not worth the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Sweater is Snow Cute!
items.body: Love this sweater! Bought it for a winter theme day at work. Very cute and comfortable! The fit was just right. It was a thin material, but still kept me warm. Overall, the quality was great, it doesn’t feel cheap at all. The only downside for me was the sequins were a bit rough so I had to hug my kids sideways because I didn’t want to scratch them. Even with that, still love this sweater. Would buy again! Read more
items.author: April I

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: Great quality sweater. Fits true to size and is just the right thickness to provide warmth. Adorable Christmas sweater. Read more
items.author: AHT5

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super-Cute!
items.body: This sweater is amazing unfortunately I am tall 5'10", have long legs and arms, and the sleeves are way too short. Otherwise I loved it but am returning. For reference I am approximately 145 lbs and ordered the medium. The sweater itself is lightweight, more like a heavy shirt thickness but ends up being heavy due to all the sequins on the snowman. As others have mentioned, it does have a wider neck opening but will look cute with tank top straps, thick or thin, peeking out. It is very cute. You will not be disappointed if you order this. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute
items.body: The bow could’ve been sewed on stronger. I will have to sew it on tighter myself. Other than that I received a lot of compliments. It is nice , soft, and comfy as well. Read more
items.author: Donna Bevilaque

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Holiday Sweater
items.body: This is a nice sweater. I brought it for my daughter to wear to our Christmas party. It's true to size and she liked the tassels hanging down. Read more
items.author: bribri

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater but the tassels…
items.body: The sweater is super cute and fits really well, but the tassels fall off. There were 5 tassels messed up upon arrival and the. Another one fell off completely after having it on for less than an hour. I would have probably returned upon opening if I didn’t have to have it the very next day. Read more
items.author: Gail W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hilarious sweater
items.body: I'm so happy I went ahead and ordered this! There were some negative reviews that made me unsure of the quality. I'm happy to report that the quality of my sweater was great! I wore it to my work Xmas party and it was a hit lol Go ahead and order it! Read more
items.author: Alicia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material thickness
items.body: I LOVE how festive this sweater is. The design is stylish with just enough bling. The material isn’t a thick soft material like most sweaters but it’s more lightweight but still has a heaviness to it that keeps you warm! It’s comfortable. I did turn it inside out and put it in a garment bag and washed in cold water on delicate cycle and hung dry it. It came out just fine. Great holiday sweater! Read more
items.author: Liz

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sequin Flamingo (White Pink), Sequin Christmas Lights (Blue), Cheer Pong (Black), Red Nose Santa (Grey), Navy Bumble, Sleighin' It (Navy), Lookin' Like a Snacc (Green), Women's It's Flipping Christmas (Green), Happy Holidays Tassel (Red Gold), Red Feliz Navidad Tassel, Gremlins (Gray Red White), Red Merry Christmas Tassel Turtleneck Cropped, Selfie Santa (Gray Red White), Green Squirrelin' Around. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
